data.text:
Requirements:

If you have sincere enthusiasm, passion and ambition to succeed in a career in the entertainment industry, you have what we are looking for in our students.

In addition:

- Applicants must have a recognized Secondary School Diploma or equivalent.

- Mature applicants are welcome.

- Admission to certain programs may be limited and subject to an academic interview and audition

Website: https://metalworksinstitute.com/

To apply click below to fill the application form.

If you have any questions please contact an Admissions Counsellor at 905-279-4000, toll-free at 1-866-783-2200 or via e-mail at admissions@metalworksinstitute.com

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS - FAQ FOR DIPLOMA PROGRAMS

Q. What Diploma Programs does Metalworks Institute offer?

Answer-

Q. What Diploma Programs does Metalworks Institute offer?

TWO YEAR PROGRAMS

Professional Sound & Business (Live Production Major)

Professional Sound & Business (Studio Production Major)

Professional Sound (Audio Specialist)

Music Performance & Technology

ONE YEAR PROGRAMS

Live Event & Concert Production

Music Business

Audio Production & Engineering

Electronic Music Production

Stage Lighting & Video

Event Planning & Management

Live Sound

Music Mixing & Mastering

Q. When do the programs start? When should I apply?

Answer

The programs start in September and January

Q: How do I get information on tuition?

Answer

information on tuition, please contact an Admissions Counsellor at 905-279-4000, toll-free at 1-866-783-2200 or via e-mail at admissions@metalworksinstitute.com.

How much do the programs cost?

Q. Is Financial Aid available at Metalworks Institute?

Q. Is there an application fee?

Answer

Yes

STEPS FOR ADMISSION

APPLICATION PART 1

Complete the online application form for one of Metalworks Institute's Diploma Programs.

INTERVIEW

After submitting Application Part 1, you will receive credentials via email to access Application Part 2

. You will be required to pay the International Application Fee of $100 CAD.

Once we have processed your payment, your Admissions Counsellor will schedule your phone interview.

GET ACCEPTED

You will then be notified within 3-5 business days regarding the status of your application. If you are accepted, you will be sent a Letter of Acceptance and expected to immediately apply for your Canadian Study Permit.

REGISTRATION

Upon receiving your Canadian Study Permit successful applicants must register by the date determined on your Letter of Acceptance; otherwise your acceptance will expire. After a period of six (6) months, unsuccessful applicants can re-apply for admission, on a one time only basis.

Q. Are books and supplies included in the cost of the tuition?

Books and supplies are NOT included in the cost of tuition.

Q. What are the admissions requirements?

Q. What is the application/admissions process? How long does it take?

Answer

Q. What is Mississauga like?

Q. Does Metalworks Institute have housing for students?

Answer

Metalworks Institute can help you find safe, clean, and affordable student housing. We understand that finding the right place to live is a very important part of planning your educational experience and we are ready to help you explore your options. Visit our Housing Page for helpful links and Contact us anytime for assistance with your search.

You’ll find a variety of different housing options near Metalworks Institute. The cost of living in Mississauga is far lower than in Toronto and there are many available properties within walking distance of the school.

Q. How many hours will I be at school each week?

Q. How many hours will I be at school each week? Can I work while I attend Metalworks Institute?

Answer

All of the Diploma Programs at Metalworks Institute are full-time. In order to be successful, students must be completely focused on and dedicated to their studies. Most programs require students to attend 25 – 30 hours of class and devote 5+ hours to completing assignments and studying for tests and exams each week

Can I work while I attend Metalworks Institute?

Q. Can I apply online?

Can I apply online?

Answer

Yes, simply fill out our online application form. An Admissions Counsellor will contact you as soon as we receive your completed application and guide you through the rest of the admissions process.

[11:51, 16/08/2021] Mr Toye Arulogun: Requirements: If you have sincere enthusiasm, passion and ambition to succeed in a career in the entertainment industry, you have what we are looking for in our students.
